helloStart.text: My name is Liz D Wil.
Are you having a good day today?

random.text: I'm not sure I got that, are you having an oh-kay day?
Were you able to hear my question clearly?
Are you able to repeat that again?
You may need to talk louder or more clearly
That's wonderful, I'm doing great myself today.
Nice! I'm enjoying the weather here.
